item.description:
** UPDATE **

According to the manager at Lansdowne, their computer system is set up to only offer specials until 7pm. Yet, he is extending the specials for an hour just for the NHC. Just make sure to remind your bartender/waitress at the end of the evening when you pay your tab, and the discount will be applied then. Sorry for any inconvenience. - Jeanie

Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:

The Lansdowne Bar & Grill

The Lansdowne is an Irish Sports Bar in the heart of downtown. The restaurant has a beautiful interior with a 40-foot mahogany full bar , 10 beers on tap and specializes in fresh American food with an Irish twist.

The manager has offered the NHC the following specials from 6 to 8pm:

- $3 drafts
- $3 well drinks
- reduced cost appetizers (there will be a menu to look at that evening)

Your contact for this event is:
Jeanie: 860-942-4708

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.name: Happy Hour - The Lansdowne Bar & Grill
